comment.body: I will look in to it, planning to build a NAS, so i can help seeding as well (yea i am female, and blond, mostly geek)

> [nippletwister](#comment_8_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf): Good idea! Maybe we can add some common setting in each site that it should or should not be automatically added on sites like 0list, 0neSite and ZeroCentral after being autoseeded.

Or, automatically drop sites not updated for a set time?
